text: Marta Arce Payno (born July 27, 1977 in Valladolid) is a judo athlete from Spain. She has a disability: She is blind and a B3 type athlete. She competed in judo at the 2004 Summer Paralympics, 2008 Summer Paralympics and 2012 Summer Paralympics. She finished second at the 2004 Games in the Up to 57 Kg group. She finished second at the 2008 Games in the Up to 63 Kg group. She finished third in the 2012 Games Up to 63 Kg group. She got a job with help from the Employment HPOD PROAD Program, which is helped by ONCE. == References == Category:Spanish judoka Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:2012 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Valladolid Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B3
title: Marta Arce Payno
